title: Brazzos
description: He’s not some dumb cop you see on TV. He’s Brazzos.
quote: This sends the investigation into a whole new direction.
altHero: Charles-Haden Savage as Brazzos, a sunglasses-wearing detective
alt1: Brazzos leans against a wall while a man in a denim jacket sits handcuffed at an interrogation table
alt3: closeup of the man in handcuffs
